data.eml:eml: First caddisfly species from Mexican amber (Insecta: Trichoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wichard, Wilfried, Solórzano, Mónica M., Kraemer, Luer, Claus (2006): First caddisfly species from Mexican amber (Insecta: Trichoptera). Zootaxa 1378: 37-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175015
